<h2>Introduction</h2>
<p>
This is the list of changes performed in the library code.

<h2>Details</h2>
<p>
<b>Version 0.9</b>
<ul>
<li>Developer Documentation generated</li>
<li>Issue 1 : The imported object is not equal to the original.</li>
<li>Issue 2 : Error importing an object, that does not extend the XMLbridge class, from an XML file.</li>
<li>The code was refactored.</li>
<li>The code is cleaner and documented.  It is easier to understand.</li>
<li>The sample files are easier to understand.</li>
</ul>
</p>
<p>
<b>Version 0.6</b>
<ul>
<li>_XMLbridge.php_ file updated.  If an internal object does not have a XMLbridge parent class, then no content will be print in that object's node.</li>
<li>_XMLserialize.php_ file added to the project. This class makes use of the object name instead of the "elements" word in the XML generated tags.</li>
<li>_sample2.php_ example file added to the project</li>
</ul>
</p>
<p>
<b>Version 0.5</b>
